eqcorrscan.core.bright_lights._cum_net_resp¶

eqcorrscan.core.bright_lights._cum_net_resp(node_lis, instance=0)[source]¶

Compute the cumulative network response by reading saved energy .npy files.

Parameters:
  • node_lis (numpy.ndarray) List of nodes (ints) to read from
  • instance (int) Instance flag for parallel workflows, defaults to 0.
Returns:

cumulative network response
Return type:

numpy.ndarray
Returns:

node indeces for each sample of the cumulative network response.
Return type:

list
